pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with International Monetary Fund Managing Director Christine Lagarde | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke today with the Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), Christine Lagarde.

They discussed the state of the global economy, and Prime Minister Trudeau noted his governmentâ€™s intent to play a more active role in multilateral institutions.
